name: Technologyuserlists
tag_list: sap-users-list, oracle-user-list, erp-users-list, it-decision-makers-list, peoplesoft-users-list, crm-users-list
description: Leading provider of Technology User List
overview:
Technology User Lists is a leading provider of Business Technology Databases and Database Marketing Services. We help organizations to acquire and retain quality and targeted customers through our comprehensive and accurate technology lists.

Established in 2001, Technology User Lists has managed and delivered niche market information for high performance database marketing. Our patented list management and list building strategies deliver significant customer growth for national and global companies. We acquire data through in-depth research that are regularly updated to maintain accuracy and freshness.

Technology User Lists offers a wide range of business technology lists that covers users interested in technology products and solutions. Our extensive databases will provide you with the most comprehensive international coverage you can ever imagine.
